rescuecore2.misc.gui
Class PanZoomListener

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.misc.gui.PanZoomListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
public class PanZoomListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener

A mouse listener that will handle panning and zooming in conjunction with a ScreenTransform.

Constructor Summary
PanZoomListener(javax.swing.JComponent component)
          Construct a PanZoomListener that listens for events on a JComponent.
